text: "Goin' Down Slow" or "Going Down Slow" is a 1941 blues song by St. Louis Jimmy Oden. It is considered to be a blues standard. It has been covered by Howlin' Wolf, Bobby Bland, B.B. King and Eric Clapton. ==References== Category:1941 songs Category:Blues music Category:Howlin' Wolf songs Category:Bobby Bland songs Category:B.B. King songs Category:Eric Clapton songs
title: Going Down Slow
